data.description:
This is a totally unique personalised hand-drawn map, illustrated with all of your special memories leading up to that milestone birthday. This makes the perfect gift for loved ones who are celebrating that BIG 40th birthday! Illustrated from scratch, we will hand-draw a 'map' of up to 14 of your favourite memories of that person. Maybe they have been on some amazing holidays with loved ones and have some memorable personal highlights.

Pick from 2 sizes: A4 £60 (6 PLACES MAX) / 30x40cm £120 (10-14 PLACES)
Using the text fields fill out the name of a place - this can be a country / city / town / park - any place that is special to you and your loved ones.
Tell us a memory of that 'place' - ie: a specific building / landmark / hotel / food / drink / activity.
**PLEASE CHOOSE NO MORE THAN 1 or 2 MEMORIES PER PLACE**
Tell us the names you would like to write on the print.
Tell us the colour you would like - you can pick from: Black / Grey / Navy / Blue / Green / Marigold / Papaya / Rose / Burgundy / Almond

data.product: Personalised Oak Photo Block With Heart And Initials
data.description:
A personalised oak photo block, printed with your photo above a love heart containing the initials of a couple, as if carved into the wood.

Create a sentimental gift by adding a favourite photo to this solid oak photo block. Add initials to appear in a heart below the image, that appears to have been romantically carved into the wood, to make a thoughtful, sentimental photo gift to cherish for years to come.

A perfect romantic gift for a partner on any occasion, including a birthday gift, anniversary gift (specifically fifth wedding anniversary, celebrated with wood!) or Valentine gift.

A great gift for the hard to buy for or the person who has everything! Simply add a favourite photo to bring a smile to the face of the recipient.

HOW TO SUPPLY YOUR PHOTO:
• Please supply your photo AFTER your order has been placed and email to orders [!at] thedriftingbear.com with your order number

PLEASE NOTE: If your image cannot be cropped to the portrait shape, and is more suited to a landscape format, we will produce your wooden block in landscape for you. The wood colour & grain will show through behind your photo, making the photo appear slightly darker. Please see example images.

made from:
Each wooden block is handcrafted from natural oak, sourced from sustainably managed forests. Each block is natural, meaning no oil, varnish, wax or stain, just natural wood, sanded on both front and back faces.

Your wood block will arrive in either tissue paper or a natural cotton gift bag, ready to give as a gift and will be sent out in plastic free packaging with tracked delivery.

dimensions:
Standard - 15cm x 10cm, 2cm thick.
Large - 15cm x 20cm, 2cm thick.

↟ EVERY ORDER PLANTS ONE TREE - As an additional gift to you & our planet, for every order placed, The Drifting Bear Co plant one tree in an area of the world that needs it most. ↟

An original design © The Drifting Bear Co.

data.product: Anniversary Gift For Him Boyfriend Gift For Husband Best Gifts For Him Unique Valentines Gift
data.description:
A sweet and humorous candle with the message 'You are the BEST thing I've ever found on the internet'.

- 9oz Amber Jar | 7oz Net Weight
- Dimensions: 2.85” wide x 3.5” tall
- Burn time: Approximately 40-50 hours
- Handcrafted in the U.S.A

Scent Notes:
- [Ocean Breeze] A smooth and elegant blend of soft floral notes. The first comes with ozone, followed by the floral notes of jasmine, Lily of the Valley, and green leaves, while the base note is of wood and tonka bean.
- [Warm+Cozy] A Winter-Scented Holiday Candle You Must Have! Sitting next to the fireplace with a glass of mulled wine, enjoy the warm and cozy day with our beautiful scented candle specially made for you.
- [Pumpkin Spice] A warm blend of Pumpkin, allspice, ginger, cinnamon, nutmeg, ground cloves, and Vanilla. Substantial, warm, inviting fall in a jar—a best-scented candle for fall and the holiday season.
- [Teakwood] Masculine, bold, and complex. Spicy, woody, and smoke. Some call it the boyfriend scent.
- [Strewberry Cake] Light it up. This "Piece of cake" will make your day. Immerse yourself in the irresistible aroma of a freshly baked cake with the delightful notes of sugary strawberry, raspberry, and Vanilla. A hint of sweet Tonka and a splash of white freesia add a touch of elegance, culminating in the subtle sweetness of velvety white frosting.
- [Champagne] Cheers to life's beautiful moments with our Champagne Toast Candle. This celebratory scent features bright and crisp champagne bubbles that are expertly balanced with the subtle sweetness of pink sugar and soft musk tones. Perfect for any occasion. Light it up and raise a glass to life, love, and all the beautiful moments in between!

Candle Care:
- Always trim wicks to 1/4 inch before lighting.
- The first time you light your candle, let it burn for 3-4 hours to allow the melted wax to reach the edge of the container and prevent your candle from tunneling.
- Burn 3-4 hours maximum use on a stable.

data.description:
This funny candle will make a great gift for a friend, co-worker or loved one. Customize it with a name!

Product Details & Ingredients:
Featuring an elegant straight-sided amber glass jars with modern minimalist labels - these candles are perfect for gift giving!

Wax Color: Natural (No Dyes)
Wick Material: Cotton (Lead and Zinc free)
Wax Material: Hand-Poured Coconut Soy Wax Made in the USA
Hand Poured in the USA
Standard 9 oz Amber Jar | Net Wt: 8.7 oz
Diameter: 2.75 in
Height: 3.5 in
Burn time: Up to 50 hours +

Small 4 oz Amber Jar | Net Wt: 3.7 oz
Diameter: 2.25in
Height: 2.75 in
Burn time: Up to 20 hours +

Candle Care:
Trim Your Wick to 1/4" Before the Candle is Lit Each Time. Allow the wax to melt to the edges of the jar every burn to prevent tunneling - especially important on the first burn! Never leave a lit candle unattended, and don't burn for more than 4 hours at a time. To protect the surface below from heat, place your candle on a coaster or tile. Don't burn your candle if only 1/4"-1/2" of wax remains. Lighting a candle without enough wax can overheat the jar. Never Leave a Burning Candle Unattended.

Please find the details for all our fragrances below.

Beachwood - Refreshing fragrance combines woodsy and marine notes into a luxurious, aquatic accord. A balance of sea salt, orange peel and green grass fold into waves of sage and eucalyptus mid notes, which rest on an island of moss, teakwood, and patchouli.

Blackberry Vanilla - Mouthwatering blend of ripe berries and creamy vanilla. Balanced aromas of sweet, dark berries with velvety vanilla. A top note of black cherry gives away to a heart of raspberry, strawberry and plum, while base notes of vanilla, sugar and musk keep this fragrance grounded.

Blood Orange - A melody of citrus gives way to vetiver and cedar with green leaf undertones. This fragrance has a bright, punchy flair with a slight creaminess that keep it balanced. Citrus fragrances meld into a strong, bright fragrance with a hint of peach and a naturally derived sweetness.

Cinnamon Chai - The comfort of Cinnamon Chai, a centuries-old beverage, is beautifully captured with warm notes of vanilla paired with cinnamon, cardamom, and orange peel. The ultimate comfy, cozy fragrance.

Evergreen - Evergreen has mild top notes of lemon peel and cypress grounded by earthy undercurrents and a woody, fir balsam core that makes you think of the holiday season. Evergreen is the perfect aroma for creating a festive holiday setting or enjoying a quiet winter evening by the fire.

Sage & Cypress - An herbal, lightly coniferous scent with a hint of smoke, this fragrance has a sophisticated base of palo santo and patchouli dusted with notes of muck and smoke. This blend grows into heady mid-notes of sage and cypress, followed by spruce and bergamot top notes.

Wild Fig - Wild Fig is an intricate fusion of woody and floral aromas. Reminiscent of a sun-drenched grove, hints of sweet freesia and ozone open up to sun-ripened fid surrounded by light jasmine, cherry blossom, and geranium. Notes of green leaves, bamboo, and moss add a lush, green quality balanced by shades of patchouli and saffron.

Introducing our Personalized Men's Duffle Bag, a timeless travel companion designed for the modern adventurer. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, this duffle bag is the epitome of style, functionality, and durability.

Crafted from premium full grain leather, this bag exudes a sense of sophistication and luxury. The full grain leather not only adds a touch of elegance but ensures the bag's longevity, developing a rich patina over time that tells the story of your journeys.

This duffle bag is thoughtfully designed to cater to the needs of both men and women on the move. The spacious interior is lined and features a secure zippered pocket, allowing you to organize and stow your essentials with ease. Whether it's a weekend getaway or a week-long trip, this bag offers ample space for your clothing, toiletries, and travel essentials.

Make it truly yours by adding a personal touch. We offer customization options, allowing you to emboss your initials, a name, or a meaningful date onto the leather, creating a unique and cherished item. This personalization adds sentiment and individuality to your duffle bag, making it a perfect gift for groomsmen or a cherished Christmas present.

Whether you're a business traveler, or a weekend explorer, this duffle bag is your reliable companion. The dual handles and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap provide flexibility in carrying options, making it convenient to carry however you prefer.

Elevate your travel experience with this Personalized Men's Duffle Bag. It's more than just a bag; it's a statement of style, a reflection of your personality, and a lasting reminder of unforgettable adventures.

data.description: This handmade ceramic lamp, made in a small boutique studio in Tel Aviv, is characterized by its unique design that combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green with a slight touch of orange-red on top. The lamp is 7.9-inch \ 24 cm in height (without the bulb) and 7.9-inch \ 20 cm diameter, and comes with 60 inches \ 150 cm golden textile cable and a terracotta 4-inch \ 10 cm ceiling rose. Suitable for standard E27 bulb, Voltage 110V-250V | 25 to 40W max. Energy-saving LED light bulbs are recommended. Note that the bulb is not included. This product is made to order by hand so that it may be slightly different from the one in the photo, please allow 1-2 weeks production time before shipping. This piece is part of the Apilar collection.
